title: Stuck at Reconnect (EUW)
body: ARURF is out, i played some and then when the game ended i logged out. 30 mins later I log in and the client thinks im in game so it tries to reconnect to a game but unable to  (ghost game i believe) [Cancel/Retry]. I can only click on Reconnect on the client and  I cant do anything anymore on my account. Anyone have the same problem ? Help me pls :(

replies.body: Sounds like there's some EU specific problems going on atm. You'd be better off looking to the EU Technicall Support page rather than here on OCE, since our server isn't having the same issue: https://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en
